TITLE: Khauta ea ho Khutla ea mahala ea Gluten
LINE1: Ke na le boloetse bo bitsoang Celiac Disease 'me ke tlameha ho latela lijo tse sa lefelloeng tsa gluten.
LINE2: Ka hona ke ka kula haholo haeba ke ja lijo tse nang le lithōle kapa lijo-thollo tsa koro, rye, harese le li-oats.
LINE3: Na lijo tse na le phofo kapa lijo-thollo tsa koro, rye, harese kapa li-oats? Haeba ha ho pelaelo hore na lijo li na le eng, ka kōpo mpolelle.
LINE4: Nka ja lijo tse nang le raese, poone, litapole, mefuta eohle ea meroho le litholoana, mahe, chisi, lebese, nama le tlhapi - hafeela li sa phehoe ka phofo ea koro, batter, breadcrumbs kapa sauce.
